summary: The module provides unit tests for internal logging helper utilities of the Lightning Fabric framework, checking that operations such as adding prefixes to log keys, converting objects to JSONâ€‘compatible forms, transforming parameter structures, flattening nested dictionaries, and sanitizing both callable and regular parameters behave as expected. Simple helper functions are used to support the test scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the logging infrastructure within Lightning Fabric so that experiment tracking and debugging information is recorded accurately.
